titles.title: A resolution honoring the service of Reverend Lloyd Ogilvie.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/25/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Honors the significance of the ten-year anniversary of the Reverend Lloyd Ogilvie (former Chaplain of the Senate elected on January 24, 1995) by declaring that his service to the Senate and this Country are remembered. Expresses gratitude to him for his ministry to the Senate family.
